universum.studios.android.fragment

Class ActionBarDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.fragment.ActionBarDelegate

  • public abstract class ActionBarDelegate
extends Object
    ActionBarDelegate is used to wrap an instance of ActionBar or ActionBar in order to hide some implementation details when using ActionBar within fragments.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Context mContext
      Instance of context used to access application data.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @Nullable
public static ActionBarDelegate create(@NonNull
                                                  Activity activity)
        Wraps an ActionBar of the given activity to its corresponding delegate depending on the activity's implementation.

        Note, that this method will return null if the specified activity does not have its ActionBar available at the time.

        Parameters:
        activity - The activity of which action bar to wrap.
        Returns:
        Instance of ActionBarDelegate for ActionBar of the specified activity.
        See Also:
        Activity.getActionBar(), AppCompatActivity.getSupportActionBar()

      • create

        @NonNull
public static ActionBarDelegate create(@NonNull
                                                 Context context,
                                                 @Nullable
                                                 ActionBar actionBar)
        Wraps the given actionBar into its corresponding delegate.
        Parameters:
        context - Context used to access application data.
        actionBar - The desired action bar to wrap. May be null to create mock delegate.
        Returns:
        New instance of ActionBarDelegate with the given action bar.

      • create

        @NonNull
public static ActionBarDelegate create(@NonNull
                                                 Context context,
                                                 @Nullable
                                                 ActionBar actionBar)
        Wraps the given support actionBar into its corresponding delegate.
        Parameters:
        context - Context used to access application data.
        actionBar - The desired action bar to wrap. May be null to create mock delegate.
        Returns:
        New instance of ActionBarDelegate with the given action bar.
